name: Increase Military Funding
description: It is clear that the reason for the Western Revolt was that military funding was not high enough. With war with China inevitable, we must increase it massively if we are to survive.

name: Cavalry Primacy
description: Cavalry has always been a staple of the Mongolian military. In the harsh steppes of the nation, cavalry helps traverse it quickly and outmanoeuvre the enemy.

name: Invest in Weapon Research
description: Our weapons are old and becoming redundant. Some are still relics from the Weltkrieg. Research into better weapons is necessary if we are to survive against Chinese aggression.

name: Aggressive Industrialisation
description: Much of the population lives a nomadic lifestyle, not in the cities or towns. Due to this, the low population, and the harsh conditions, Mongolia's industry is very lacking. We should give businessmen and investors the ability to invest in Mongolia even if they break our already weak laws about workers rights. In fact, it should even be encouraged!

name: Train the Nomads
description: The nomadic population of the steppes is too disunited and not trained enough to be a strong military force. Great training is needed to be able to make war like we must.

name: Set Unattainable Goals
description: In state owned factories, we should set goals that are completely unattainable for the workers, so they are encouraged to work harder as they hopelessly try to reach their targets, otherwise a beating awaits.

name: Baron of the Steppes
description: Though Mongolia's large empty steppes make it hard to govern all its nomadic peoples, it must be made clear that Ungern-Sternberg is the Baron of all Mongolian people.

name: Reform Russia Policy
description: With Ungern-Sternberg in power, we have always been relatively close with Russia. Now that both our and their situation has changed, we have the opportunity to change our policy towards them.

name: Russian Friendship
description: The Russians are the brothers of Mongolians. Our relationship must remain close if we are to survive.

name: Give Russians Citizenship
description: After Ungern-Sternberg's invastion of Mongolia, many Russians joined him. Since then, a constant stream of Russian people have come in from the north. They should be allowed to become full citizens to show our full relationship with the northern regime.

name: Military Mission to Russia
description: Our military was for years supported by Russian officers, some directly sent from Russia. It is time to ask once again for Russian support.

name: Restart Economic Aid
description: Economic aid from Russia was ended following the assassination of Kerenskiy. With both of our governments now stable, there is no reason not to restart this aid.

name: Promote Russian Co-operation
description: We should promote co-operation between Mongolians and Russians to the Mongolian people who are not yet convinced about our friendship.

name: Rectify Arms Treaties
description: Before the death of Kerenskiy, Russia and Mongolia had multiple arms treaties to keep our army supplied. We should approach them once again to get these benefits.

name: Request Russian Guarantees
description: We cannot survive alone. With our position secure, we should approach Russia for guarantees of our independence, to protect ourselves from Chinese encroachment.

name: Cast the Dice, Alone
description: The Russians abandoned us as soon as their position changed. We must act alone, for we are the only ones we can trust.

name: Promote Mongol Identity
description: If we are to abandon Russian safety, we should promote Mongolism to keep the nation united.

name: Attract Chinese Mongols
description: Many Mongolian people are trapped under Chinese control. We should try to attract them to immigrate here, so that they can serve us.

name: Claim Trans-Siberian Railway
description: The Trans-Siberian Railway that runs over Mongolia has massive Mongolian minorities. It is rightful Mongolian clay, and though we are very unlikely to take it, it is a strong show of force for our people to claim it.

name: Ready for War
description: While alone, we must prepare for war. We are surrounded by threats, so we must act accordingly.

name: Militarist Propaganda
description: The society of Mongolia must become completely and utterly committed to the military if we are to survive against our enemies.

name: We Stand Alone
description: The Mongolian people have been abandoned by our allies, and trapped in by our enemies. Though we stand alone on the world stage, we must fight eternally for our independence.

name: Centralised Power Under Ungern-Sternberg
description: One of the problems that caused the revolt in the West and the chaos that descended into Urga was because we were forced to share power. The radical buddhists and rich princes had large power in our government. Now, with them defeated, we can centralise power under Ungern-Sternberg, so that he can protect the nation.

name: Propaganda in the Cities
description: With the cities being the only main population groups in the nation, a massive propaganda campaign should be started in them, to entrench the idea that conformity to the state is required to survive.

name: Destroy the Socialists
description: Though the socialist MAN were unable to take power months ago during the Western Revolt, they still control some small cells, primarily in the hard to reach north of the nation. These cells must be completely destroyed if we are to be safe from the communist threat.

name: Young Officer Schools
description: We should try to get the best officers we can for our military, and a great way to do this is to start training them from a young age. The opening of multiple young officer schools in Mongolia should help bolster our officer class.

name: Full Allegiance to Ungern
description: The people must be taught that they do not have a choice in serving Ungern-Sternberg. The state and the Baron must come first in life, and everything they do should be to help the state survive and thrive.

name: Encourage Myths and Legends
description: Most Mongolians still believe much folklore and myths about history and current life. Many people even believe Ungern-Sternberg to be the reincarnation of Jamsaran, the God of War. Though it would not be stately to directly confirm these myths, we should secretly encourage these myths across the nation, so that people continue to fear the Baron.

name: The Legend Lives on
description: Baron Unger-Sternberg will never die. He controls the state and is the state. Those who have not realised this yet must be put to the gallows.
